problem_text_cn: 学校、电影院、公园的平面图上的标点分别是A、B、C,电影院在学校的正东方向,公园在学校的南偏西25°方向,那么平面图上的∠CAB等于()．
problem_text_en: The punctuation on the plan of the school, cinema, and park are A, B, and C respectively. The cinema is in the east of the school, and the park is in the N_0 direction to the west of the school. Then ∠CAB on the plan is equal to ().
